description: Alpenglow Hoody offers a welcome respite, with UPF 50+ and BD.cool mineral-based in-fiber cooling technology, which reflects 71% of near- infrared rays, plus Polygiene Odor Control, helping to reduce wearer’s perceived temperature, making it a must-have for any desert kit.
name: Black Diamond Alpenglow Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Polyester Stretch Textured Knit - 87% Polyester, 13% Elastane
